DOC.brief_summary: Post-approval study safety effectiveness NATRELLE速 410 Highly Cohesive Anatomically Shaped Silicone-Filled Breast Implants ( Styles 410 FM , FF , MM , MF ) breast augmentation , reconstruction , revision
DOC.brief_title: NATRELLE速 410 Full Moderate Height/Projection Breast Implant Continued Access Post-Approval Study
DOC.criteria: For entry study , subject must enrol 410 CA Clinical Study 410 CARE Clinical Study inclusion criterion list receive NATRELLE速 410 Highly Cohesive Anatomically Shaped SiliconeFilled Breast Implants Styles 410 FM , FF , MM , MF 1 ( unilateral breast reconstruction revision ) breast . Female , age 18 old Present one follow condition : Primary breast augmentation ( i.e. , previous breast implant surgery ) indicate subject dissatisfaction , size shape breast ( e.g. , mammary hypoplasia ) , asymmetry , ptosis , aplasia Primary breast reconstruction ( i.e. , previous breast implant surgery implantation tissue expanders contralateral augmentation asymmetry ) indicate , affect breast , mastectomy cancer , prophylactic mastectomy , breast trauma ( result mastectomy ) unaffected breast , contralateral asymmetry ( may perform date mastectomy date permanent implant place reconstruct breast ) Breast implant revision surgery ( i.e. , removal replacement breast implant ) indicate previous augmentation reconstruction siliconefilled salinefilled breast implant Has adequate tissue available cover implant Willing undergo MRI specify followup visit subject MRI designate site eligible MRI ( e.g. , implant metal metal device , history severe claustrophobia ) For entry study , subject must enrol 410 CA Clinical Study 410 CARE Clinical Study meet exclusion criterion list receive NATRELLE速 410 Highly Cohesive Anatomically Shaped SiliconeFilled 410 X LStyle Breast Implants Does advance fibrocystic disease consider premalignant without accompany subcutaneous mastectomy Does exist carcinoma breast , without mastectomy Does abscess infection body time enrollment Is pregnant nursing Does disease , include uncontrolled diabetes ( e.g. , HbA1c > 8 % ) , clinically know impact wound heal ability Does show tissue characteristic clinically incompatible mammaplasty , tissue damage result radiation , inadequate tissue , compromise vascularity , ulceration Does treatment condition may constitute unwarranted surgical risk ( e.g. , unstable cardiac pulmonary problem ) Does show psychological characteristic may incompatible surgical procedure prosthesis , inappropriate attitude motivation ( e.g. , body dysmorphic disorder ) Is willing undergo surgery revision , medically require
